case.state: Poker, huh? Is it the boring type or the not-so boring type? Well, either way I'm in.

case.state: You can enjoy looking at my body a little bit longer. I'm not out of this juuust yet.

My ax bass is actually a family heirloom. Used to be a full-blown battle axe, but someone made it into a bass so I could use it. It's super freakin' cool, isn't it?

Ready to get your butts kicked? I totally am.

I've been travelling around everywhere on Ooo since I was three hundred years old, but this place is new. Do you guys know anywhere cool to explore?

I see you eying my ax bass. It's so sharp, it's perfect for chopping off limbs off of monsters and people.

You guys have been glancing at my ax bass a bunch. Nervous about me using it on you? It can cut through flesh like it's nothing.
I'll come clean; I was joking about being a super evil vampire. It was fun to see some of you actually buy i t!
I'm gonna be real to y'all. I'm not actually a evil vampire, just your normal chaotic-good one. It was hilarious to watch you guys take it super seriously though.
You know, I do live music shows everywhere around Ooo. You guys should go check it out, I'll give you free seats to my next concert!

I've been using music as a way to just... let all my stress and worries out ever since I was little. It's been a big part of my life.
I love writing and preforming all of my songs, and they give me the extra boost to talk about everything going on in my life better. Music is like, my favourite thing in the world.

(Wonder if I'll have to return the favor.)

You're sparing no time, I see.
Don't mind me, I'll be over here.

Honk honk honk honk honk honk honk...
Clank clank clank clank clank clank clank...
Do you even have anything to work off of? Who am I kidding, of course you do.
You didn't lose on purpose, did you?
Surprised you can keep it up with all this pressure, ~name~.
How ya holding up over there?
Got enough to work with over there?

What, you're still going at it?

(You like my body, don't you? You love my body.)

You're gonna clean that up, right?
I think you hit the ceiling.
Now be a good boy and clean the floor.
You lasted longer than I thought.
What a shame. It looked fun to play with.
I think I made more of a mess than you.

state.text: It's time we watched you.

case.state: Oh, so that's why you kept playing!

Don't worry, I'll be joining you soon, I'm sure.

state.text: Showoff...

Maybe this'll help you loosen up.
Looks like it.
No fair magic-ing your way out of this one.
Hmm, I don't think I've seen this routine before.
That looks fun...
Couldn't magic your way out of this one, could you?

case.state: Well, she is a certified health instructor...
Call me crazy, but I don't think this is a certified routine.

state.text: That's a fun workout...

case.state: Could you ah cast it on me too?

Well I have to keep up with the instructor, don't I?
Don't mind us, we'll just keep playing.
And she's off, ladies and gentlemen!
Try not to make too much noise. Ah, who am I kidding.
Go nice and slow... you know, so you enjoy it.
If you need help, just let me know.
Aw, are you blushing? Are you embarrassed?
Yep, good thing I didn't lose... heh.
(I bet it would feel so warm pressed against mine..)
(I can imagine it pressed against mine... their soft lips overlapping... their clits touching together...)
Let me get a good look...
If you'll do it... so will I... again...
Honk honk honk honk honk honk honk...
Clank clank clank clank clank clank clank...
Sure is getting warm in here.
Wow girl, you're really workin' it!
You're, uh, really having fun with this, aren't you?
(I've never done it in front of other people before. I wonder what it's like.)
(I bet my tongue could do better than your fingers...)
(You're all warmed up. Too bad I can't take you for a spin.)
Play with your tits a little...
As long as there's-- ah... someone to watch...

state.text: Speechless to the end, I see.
I think you've earned enough points for a bonus round.
Lucky...
When you cum in that state, do the rest cum too? Do you feel the orgasm of a thousand avatars?
At least it improved your mood. If only a little.
Crikey! Look a'that!
Venkman, get a sample!
How many calories did that burn?

case.state: I think you worked off dinner.

state.text: Care to play a bonus round?

case.state: My, I'll have to try your routine very soon.
I wonder how many EMF sensors you just set off.

state.text: I enjoyed today's session. Let's do it again next week.

case.state: Do you cum from a land down under?
You just n-never ta-hha-alk, do you?
Great session. Let's meet again next week.
You're not too upset about losing, now are you?
You look like you could go a little more.

(Easy there, Marcy. She's supposed to finish, not you.)
(That looks more fun than poker anyway.)
Your legs are quivering... so are mine... heh..
Me first? Well okay. You guys earned it.
I'm first, huh? Alright, time for the grand finale.
Oh well. At least I have some eye candy.
I have to say, part of me is glad.
You are not allowed to stream this, you hear?
Hey, I can't let you hog all the spotlight, can I?
Gotta admit, this part's new even to me.
Let's see how long I can hold out.
You should pay attention to this, ~player~. You'll learn a thing or two about pleasing a girl.
If there's one perk to being immortal, it's the fact that you have all the time in the world to explore what makes you tick.

Heh... don't worry, Doc, I'm fine.
Haha... ha... wow... that was... intense.
Hee hee... I can't stop shaking...
Yeah! How 'bout that, Journo? You can write about the time you lost!
Aw yeah! Get out the salve, Medic, 'cause you just got buuuuurned!
That was like, sadder than any wizard I've ever seen. You couldn't even take a single thing off of me!

C'mon, you guys barely took anything off of me! Up your game.
I almost feel bad for you

You ever feel like playing again, just say the word.
You sure know how to have fun. Let's play again sometime.
I like this game. Even when I lose, I still win.

scene.directive: Okay, I'm here! Now why were you so anxious to bring me over?
Oh, no reason. I was just getting so lonely, is all.
Well, I was getting a little tired from work...
There, see? You need to take it easy. Unwind, have some fun...
Well, okay... I suppose I can take a break for at least-- oh? Who's this?
Bonnie, meet ~name~. We played a fun game last night that I think you'll really enjoy.
Oh you'd love it! It's all about probability and psychological evaluation. Isn't that right, ~name~?
Probability and-- Is it poker? I know what that is, you know.
Good! Then I won't bother explaining how to play.
When did you suddenly get into poker?
Since I found out how much fun it could be! Now go ahead and deal us in, ~name~.
Well, I suppose. Though I've never been very good at it, to be honest.
Hehe, that's no problem. Nooo problem at all.
Oh, and did I mention? This is a very special kind of poker.
